definition: to sticky (an Internet forum thread etc)

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: That block of time you just scheduled has to be given the utmost priority.
sentences.chinese: 你安排出来的时间应该置顶为首要任务。

sentences.english: Look at the top post, and you will find the information about our party venue.
sentences.chinese: 看看“置顶”，你会找到关于聚会地点的信息。

sentences.english: Specifies whether the sticky notes are visible on ALL workspaces on the desktop, or not.
sentences.chinese: 指定置顶便笺是否在所有工作空间中可见。

sentences.english: How to Unstick Your Button Maker Machine.
sentences.chinese: 如何取消置顶你的按钮制造机。

sentences.english: Plz keep this thread up… It is soo sweet to read this article here.
sentences.chinese: 让这帖子继续置顶吧，读这些评论，太有意思了。

sentences.english: Default width for new sticky notes in pixels.
sentences.chinese: 以像素为单位的新置顶便笺默认宽度。

sentences.english: Why do not see new posts List?
sentences.chinese: 现在只能看到置顶贴，没有帖子列表？

definition: to transmit/to forward (mail, SMS, packets of data)/to pass on/to republish (an article from another publication)
to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
to share (let others have some of sth good)
to like (an online post on Weibo, Facebook etc)
tweet (on Twitter)/(HK, Tw) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/to reply to original poster (or recommend a post) on PTT bulletin board
to reply/to recover/to return (to a previous condition)/Re: in reply to (email)
Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])
to pay attention to/to follow sth closely/to follow (on social media)/concern/interest/attention
Weixin or WeChat (mobile text and voice messaging service developed by Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4])
